name: JIIMOL
product_desc:
jiimol.com est une plateforme d'écoute de musique en ligne, avec plus de 800 cultures Africaines, jiimol se veut une entreprise vulgarisant l'univers de la culture africaine à travers le monde grâce aux différentes sonorités musicales du continent.
avec un système de paiement adapté au marché africain (mobile payement), nous comptons faire de la vente d'album et de l'écoute en ligne avec un système d'abonnement mensuel adapté au SMIC de différents pays.
nous proposons les musiques les plus en vogue en fonction des pays aux différents touristes visitant l’Afrique afin de s’imprégner nos valeurs culturels musicales.
A la différence de nos concurrent, nous proposons un service de collaboration à distance plus facile entre artistes de différents pays afin des couleurs dans notre univers.
high_concept: plateforme d'écoute de musique en ligne (streaming audio)

name: Anelfort
product_desc:
At ANELFORT, we believe that development is an infinite thing for humanity. Therefore a fundamental aspiration or need of more comfort exist for example when using or maintaining toilets, showers, sinks.

Currently, most of the customers have to manually use wipes, water or toilet tissue to clean themselves after using the toilets. They also have to manually wash for example their body or some parts of it with their hands.

ANELFORT brings to people a new cleaning/washing technology for both comfort and hygienic purpose. What we provide to customers is a handless, simplified and automatized cleaning mechanism after toilet use.

The products also perform the cleaning of the toilets seats, showers, and sinks. We also offer hand free washing system for shower, bathroom.

The customers are : households, hotels, hospitals, schools, universities, stadiums, nursing homes, etc. Anelfort's products can be used by children, adults and elders.

The technology is in patent pending.
high_concept: Anelfort provides artificial automation technology for people comfort and happiness.
markets: Artificial Intelligence, Industrial Automation, Health and Wellness, Home Automation

name: Solévolt
product_desc:
Solévolt is a start-up that designs and distributes high quality, high-power and easy-to-use solar generation and storage systems for a range of clients in the off-grid space.

Solévolt currently has two products in its line: (1) Solévolt Enterprise, which is the larger of the two systems and includes 500W PV panels, 1.2kWh li-ion battery, inverter, charge controller, and LED lights; and (2) Solévolt Home, which is designed for lower-power uses, includes a 100W PV panel, 250Wh li-ion battery and LED lights. Expansion kits are available for both products which can double generating and storage capacity. All systems are plug-and-play, easy to install, easy to use and easy to transport.

name: Dechets a L'Or
product_desc: Dechets a l'Or is a system approach to waste management for tier two cities in Africa that prevents contamination of water sources, and addresses supply issues by increases access to fertiliser, increases access to energy, and increases supply of raw material. We innovate on waste management by shifting for a model of collect and dump, to a model of collect, recycle, process, reuse, by engaging communities and households in waste separation, processing waste to extract recyclable materials, and using the organic portion of waste, which is over 60% of total waste, to produce compost and energy.
high_concept: Tech Enabled solid waste management solution for secondary cities in West Africa
status: Its been a busy few weeks, we pitched at HBS and MIT Sloan Africa Business Conference. From Harvard we won a spot in an incubator!
